dcterms:description: A dataset used to analyze the performance of decision-making strategies in a networked combinatorial bandit setting, focusing on the side observations received from neighboring arms.
dcterms:title: Side Observation

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides rewards received from the selected arms and their neighboring arms in a networked combinatorial bandit setting.
dcterms:title: Side Reward

dcterms:description: An algorithm designed for networked combinatorial bandit problems that incorporates side observations to improve decision-making strategies.
dcterms:title: MOSS algorithm
